trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u een besturingselement primitieve die verantwoordelijk is voor de positie en grootte van een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> besturingselement en de twee <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> besturingselementen die worden gebruikt voor het instellen van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Het besturingselement bijhouden heeft geen standaardwaarde <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>is geïmplementeerd als onderdeel van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselementen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: Het nummer is een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>besturingselement en de twee <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>besturingselementen die worden gebruikt om te wijzigen de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>eigenschap van het besturingselement bijhouden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: De volgende afbeelding ziet een volgen op een schuifregelaar.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Een nummer in een schuifregelaar**![RepeatButton, miniatuur](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, miniatuur") de volgende tabel bevat de eigenschappen van het bijhouden en de bijbehorende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>Eigenschappen die ze automatisch met bindt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de eigenschap wordt gewijzigd, wordt de eigenschap gebonden ook gewijzigd.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Bijhouden van eigenschap | de eigenschap <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| De volgende tabel bevat de eigenschappen van het bijhouden en de bijbehorende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>eigenschappen waarnaar ze binden wanneer een Track deel van uitmaakt een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>besturingselement en de eigenschappen van Track niet expliciet zijn ingesteld.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Bijhouden van eigenschap | de eigenschap <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| De volgende tabel bevat de eigenschappen van het bijhouden en de bijbehorende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>eigenschappen waarnaar ze binden wanneer een Track deel van uitmaakt een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement en de eigenschappen van Track niet expliciet zijn ingesteld.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Bijhouden van eigenschap | de eigenschap <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Bovendien de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Eigenschappen voor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>bepaalt voor een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement binden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Eigenschappen voor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>besturingselementen van het besturingselement Track.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Als een nummer wordt gebruikt om te schuiven van inhoud, de grootte van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>besturingselement is proportioneel aan het percentage van de inhoud die wordt weergegeven in het zichtbare gebied of de viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: De volgende afbeelding toont een voorbeeld van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>besturingselement waarmee een besturingselement bijhouden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Een ScrollBar met een Track**![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") de volgende berekening wordt gebruikt voor het berekenen van de grootte van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength de viewportSize-parameter de waarde van is de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: De maximale en minimale parameters overeenkomen met de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>eigenschapswaarden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: De waarde van de maximale expressie – minimum + viewportSize is de grootte van de schuifbare inhoud.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>eigenschap vertegenwoordigt de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>van het nummer wanneer de inhoud naar de onderkant wordt geschoven.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Dit <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>waarde is niet hetzelfde als de lengte of de mate van de inhoud.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Zie voor een meer gedetailleerde uitleg <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Het <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>van een nummer in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>hogere van boven naar beneden van links naar rechts, afhankelijk van de richting van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Op dezelfde manier de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>van een nummer in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>toename van beneden naar boven of links naar rechts, afhankelijk van de richting van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt wijzigen de richting van de waarde te verhogen, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>eigenschap van het nummer voor `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee maakt u de indeling voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Het gebied dat is opgegeven voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> moet worden gebruikt voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> inhoud.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> die vermindert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>eigenschap van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement bevindt zich in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>beheer, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Eigenschappen van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>bepaalt van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>binden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> die vermindert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> bepalen wanneer de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> wordt ingedrukt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> besturingselement met de standaardinstellingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald van het onderliggende lid van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> bij de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Geef van de onderliggende elementen van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>door in te stellen de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Eigenschappen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De onderliggende elementen worden geïndexeerd in de volgorde waarin de eigenschappen worden ingesteld.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: De index van de onderliggende.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert het object van het <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> bij de opgegeven index in de lijst met visual onderliggende elementen.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: De index moet een getal tussen nul (0) en de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>eigenschap min één (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven index is groter dan de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>eigenschap min één (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> die verhoogt de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>eigenschap van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klasse</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement bevindt zich in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>beheer, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Eigenschappen van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>bepaalt van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>binden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> die verhoogt de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> bepalen wanneer de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> wordt ingedrukt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> besturingselement met de standaardinstellingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld of de richting van verhogen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>uit de standaardrichting is omgekeerd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de waarde van IsDirectionReversed is ingesteld op `true`, wordt de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>en de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>in de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>exchange plaatsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>waarden voor het verhogen van links naar rechts voor beide horizontaal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>besturingselementen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Echter, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>waarden voor een verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>verhogen van boven naar beneden, terwijl voor een verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>deze waarden worden verhoogd van beneden naar boven.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Als u de eigenschap IsDirectionReversed instelt op `true`, de richting van de waarde wordt teruggedraaid.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Als u implementeert een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>als onderdeel van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>beheer- en u niet expliciet instelt de eigenschap IsDirectionReversed, de eigenschap IsDirectionReversed wordt gebonden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Gegevens van afhankelijkheidseigenschap ||| |-|-| | Id-veld | | | Eigenschappen van metagegevens is ingesteld op `true`| Geen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de <> </> *> en de <> </> *> uitgewisseld posities en de richting van de waarde is omgekeerde, anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificeert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: De id voor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de maximum mogelijke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement bevindt zich in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>besturingselement en de Maximum-eigenschap niet expliciet is ingesteld, wordt automatisch deze eigenschap gebonden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: De waarde voor Maximum voor een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>besturingselement is gelijk aan de grootte van de inhoud schuifbare minus de grootte van het zichtbare gedeelte van de inhoud of de viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld, als de grootte van de inhoud is 100 en de grootte van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>eigenschap 30, de waarde van de eigenschap Maximum 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Dit gebeurt omdat de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>besturingselement komt overeen met de positie in de schuifbare inhoud die wordt weergegeven aan de bovenkant van de viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de inhoud wordt geschoven zeer onderaan in dit voorbeeld, wordt de 30 procent van de inhoud nog steeds weergegeven in de viewport.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Daarom de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>die overeenkomt met de bovenkant van de viewport is 70 en de maximumwaarde is 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: De volgende afbeelding ziet u hoe de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>komt overeen met een positie in de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>besturingselement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.

trans-unit.target: Identificeert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum*>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum*>

trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de grootte van de lay-out die is vereist voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> en de bijbehorende onderdelen.

trans-unit.source: The size of the available space for the track.
trans-unit.target: De grootte van de beschikbare ruimte voor het nummer.

trans-unit.target: De indeling <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> die is vereist voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement bevindt zich in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>besturingselement en de eigenschap Minimum niet expliciet is ingesteld, wordt automatisch deze eigenschap gebonden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van een waarde die aangeeft of de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> horizontaal of verticaal wordt weergegeven.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Als u een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>als onderdeel van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>besturingselement en u niet expliciet de eigenschap Orientation, de afdrukstand van de eigenschap aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> gebonden ingesteld implementeert</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Als u een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>als onderdeel van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement en u niet expliciet de eigenschap Orientation, de afdrukstand van de eigenschap aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> gebonden ingesteld implementeert</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that is used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> besturingselement dat wordt gebruikt om te wijzigen de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>van een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that is used with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> besturingselement dat wordt gebruikt met de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> besturingselement met de standaardinstellingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> as determined by the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> control.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de huidige waarde van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> zoals wordt bepaald door de positie van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>besturingselement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The Value represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: De waarde vertegenwoordigt een waarde tussen de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>eigenschapswaarden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Value property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement deel uitmaakt van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>besturingselement en de waarde die eigenschap niet expliciet is ingesteld, wordt deze eigenschap automatisch bindt met de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De huidige waarde van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Berekent de wijziging in de <> </> *> van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> wanneer de <> </> *> wordt verplaatst.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: De horizontale verschuiving van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: De verticale verschuiving van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The change in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> that corresponds to the displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De wijziging in <> </> *> die overeenkomt met de verplaatsing van de <> </> *> van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Berekent de afstand van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> naar een opgegeven positie langs de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: Het opgegeven punt.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: De afstand tussen de en de opgegeven pt waarde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificeert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: De id voor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de grootte van het onderdeel van de schuifbare inhoud die zichtbaar is.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: De waarde van de eigenschap ViewportSize wordt gebruikt voor het berekenen van de grootte van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>beheren een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>wanneer de ViewportSize is het niet <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Voor meer informatie, Zie de opmerkingen bij de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De grootte van het <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>maken van een object dat is afgeleid van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>klasse en bieden onderdrukkingen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> expliciet definiëren

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Als u implementeert een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>als onderdeel van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>beheer- en u niet expliciet instelt de eigenschap ViewportSize, de eigenschap ViewportSize wordt gebonden aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: De waarde van de eigenschap ViewportSize van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>besturingselement dat is geïmplementeerd in een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>besturingselement is altijd <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, omdat de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>besturingselement niet wijzigen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Gegevens van afhankelijkheidseigenschap ||| |-|-| | Id-veld | | | Eigenschappen van metagegevens is ingesteld op `true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: De grootte van het zichtbare gedeelte van de schuifbare inhoud.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: De standaardwaarde is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, wat betekent dat de grootte van de inhoud is niet gedefinieerd.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificeert de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: De id voor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>afhankelijkheidseigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt het aantal onderliggende elementen van een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Geef van de onderliggende elementen van een <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>door in te stellen de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Eigenschappen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De onderliggende elementen worden geïndexeerd in de volgorde waarin de eigenschappen worden ingesteld.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Een geheel getal tussen 0 en 2 waarmee het aantal onderliggende elementen in de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
